# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
set(CMAKE_C_COMPILER "clang")
set(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER "clang++")
project(cpp_co_demo LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
add_executable(cpp_co_demo "")
set_target_properties(cpp_co_demo PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "cpp_co_demo")
set_target_properties(cpp_co_demo PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/debug")
target_compile_options(cpp_co_demo PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-G>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(cpp_co_demo PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Debug>:-Od>)
else()
    target_compile_options(cpp_co_demo PRIVATE -O0)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(cpp_co_demo PRIVATE -Zi)
else()
    target_compile_options(cpp_co_demo PRIVATE -g)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET cpp_co_demo PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(cpp_co_demo PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(cpp_co_demo PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)
